name: Noam Chomsky
title: Our Notes
knownFor: Universal Grammar, Critiques of Media and Imperialism
contributions: Founder of modern linguistics; exposed structural propaganda in mass media; leading voice against centralized power
bio: Chomsky’s structuralist insight into language and power illuminates the architectures of control — helping guide ZZX-Labs' pursuit of liberatory, privacy-preserving systems and resistance to techno-authoritarianism.
